definition: content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere

sentences.english: To euthanize unwanted pets has made his wife sick to her stomach.
sentences.chinese: 对不要的宠物进行安乐死，令他老婆很恶心。

sentences.english: The state medical examiner and chair ofanaesthesiology settled on a series of three drug injections.
sentences.chinese: 医疗审查者和麻醉学机构确定了安乐死的三个步骤。

sentences.english: Even so, any skunk captured in Illinois is euthanized.
sentences.chinese: 即使这样，伊利诺伊州内捕获的臭鼬均实施安乐死。

sentences.english: In a word, the legislation of mercy killing is suitable for gradualness .
sentences.chinese: 所以，安乐死立法宜循序渐进。

sentences.english: so he wanted to pretty much euthanize her.
and want to euthanize her, you know, kill.
sentences.chinese: 那时候，那个人想让她安乐死。

sentences.english: Should voluntary euthanasia &physician-assisted suicide be legalized ?
It has also been used to euthanise animals.
sentences.chinese: 它也用于动物的安乐死。

sentences.english: Then the doctor could practice mercy-killing.
sentences.chinese: 那么医生们就可以安乐死。
那只熊现在已被施行安乐死。

sentences.english: Euthanasia diverges apparently from intentional murder by committing a crime.
sentences.chinese: 安乐死在犯罪构成上与故意杀人有明显的区别。

sentences.english: These are less living wills than examples of prestructured euthanasia.
sentences.chinese: 这些与其说是生前遗嘱，不如说是提前安排的安乐死。

sentences.english: Some worry that legal euthanasia creates a slippery slope towards state-sponsored killing.
sentences.chinese: 有人担心安乐死会渐渐变成国家主动的死亡。

sentences.english: It would be better to pull the plug on him than to keep his life in such a torture.
sentences.chinese: 与其让他在这种折磨中敬且偷生，不如让他安乐死去。

sentences.english: Decriminalization of euthanasia is actually equal to acknowledgement of people's right for death by law.
sentences.chinese: 安乐死合法化实际上就是法律对人的死亡权的认可。

sentences.english: Other states are going to consider making a similar law to deal with euthanasia.
sentences.chinese: 其他国家正在考虑制仃与安乐死类似的法律。

definition: to take in and care for (an elderly person, a dog etc)/to adopt (a child)/adoption
to kill oneself/to commit suicide/to attempt suicide
